dict.acceptation: 保证，担保；保证人，保证书；抵押品；

sent.orig: Including bid guarantee, contractor surety bond guarantee, contractor payment guarantee, payment guarantee, cash warranty guarantee, etc.
sent.trans: 包括投标保证担保、承包履约保证担保、工程款支付保证担保、预付款保证担保、保修金保证担保等业务。

sent.orig: Financing bank guarantee includes financing guarantee, financing leasing guarantee, overdue guarantee, deferred payment guarantee and etc.
sent.trans: 融资性保函包括融资担保、融资租赁担保、透支担保、延期付款担保等。

sent.orig: Non-financing bank guarantee includes bidding guarantee, performance bonds, prepayment guarantee and import payment guarantee.
sent.trans: 非融资性保函包括投标、覆约担保、预付款担保、进口付款担保等。

sent.orig: Construction tender guarantees generally include bid guarantee, fulfillment guarantee and advance payment guarantee.
sent.trans: 施工招投标的担保一般包括投标担保、履约担保和预付款担保。

sent.orig: The basic categories of joint guarantee are several guarantee and joint and several guarantee.
sent.trans: 共同担保的基本分类为按份共同担保和连带共同担保。
